EmailTemplate.subject: TA13-002 - Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin - August 2012 - February 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Technical Advisory TA13-002 - Microsoft Critical Security Bulletin - August 2012 - February 2013 POSTED: 03-07-13
Dear Clients,
Microsoft has released twenty-four (24) Critical Security Updates for the months of August, 2012 through February 2013. The vulnerabilities discussed in this bulletin involve Microsoft Windows and other Microsoft products.
You may access this advisory by logging into your Salesforce Portal and clicking on the MyVisiNet tab. This will direct you to the MyVisiNet support site. You can look under Documentation | Tech Advisories | Microsoft Advisories | 2013 or by clicking on the link <https://myvisinet.tritech.com/index.php?option=com_k2&view=item&id=943:ta13-002-microsoft-critical-security-bulletin-february-2013&Itemid=251> included in this email.
Sincerely,
Shane Birch Technical Support Supervisor - Inform Solutions | Decorah, IA Direct: (563) 387.4813 l Mobile: (563) 419.8766 Fax: (563) 387.9335 l Support: (800) 847.4223
Support Website: myvisinet.tritech.com <https://myvisinet.tritech.com>
